text: Oni sprashivayut tebya o menstruatsiyakh. Skazhi: "Eto - stradaniye". Otdalyaytes' zhe ot zhenshchin pri menstruatsiyakh i ne priblizhaytes' k nim, poka oni ne ochistyatsya. A kogda oni ochistyatsya, to prikhodite k nim tak, kak prikazal vam Allakh. Poistine, Allakh lyubit obrashchayushchikhsya i lyubit ochishchayushchikhsya
